amendment.description: An amendment numbered 241 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to strike Section 510, thereby removing a ban on HHS promulgating rules on unique patient identifiers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 241 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to strike Section 510, thereby removing a ban on HHS promulgating rules on unique patient identifiers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A013) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Foster.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
